original_title: 7:01 – The Story of Viper’s Return to the Green Hell
overview: Viper returns to the "Green Hell" looking to reclaim it's title as King of the 'Ring. This time without factory support, no marketing hype, just a group of privateers who have passion for the car and want to see it go out on top.
title: 7:01 – The Story of Viper’s Return to the Green Hell
